snippet: In her new memoir, “Hard Choices,” she discusses her approach to diplomacy, but also gives a glimpse of her role as mother of the bride.
abstract: Hillary Clinton's latest memoir Hard Choices delivers a potent mix of feminine gusto and diplomatic capers, offering a sharp contrast to the argument that she needed to diminish her softer side; reveals her human, motherly and self-deprecating nature.
lead_paragraph: In her new memoir, “Hard Choices,” she discusses her approach to diplomacy, but also gives a glimpse of her role as mother of the bride.

headline.main: In Memoir, Hillary Clinton Emphasizes Her Softer Side
headline.print_headline: Mrs. Clinton Emphasizes Her Softer Side in Memoir
